I released a first Android prototype here: <a href="http://code.google.com/p/symja/downloads/detail?name=SymjaDroid.apk&can=2&q=">SymjaDroid.apk</a>.  

This is a screenshot of the interface:

http://symja.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/android_main.png

The buttons are used for:
  * *Sym* - symbolic evaluation
  * *Num* - numeric evaluation
  * *Clear* - clears the input text area
